message: If you got time, please checkout my app http://shout.codecampr.com. No logins, no passwords, just create a message then share everywhere. :) more about the story here: http://www.blog.codecampr.com/2011/02/19/shout/
thanks. :) if you have comments or suggestions, feel free to shout. hehe
Fun. Some choice words from General Maximus Decimus Meridius: http://shout.codecampr.com/3zac
I like that you have some amount of control over the design without it being cumbersome.
Nice. You just need a good, short domain name for it.
@markbranly  wow thanks much, i'm really trying to improve my UX skills, one of the reasons i created this app. :)
was also think of shout.it but it's taken. :(
I looked. The obvious shou.tt was taken. Do what everyone else does and use poor Libya's - shout.ly? Or a .to?
Awweesome!! Me wants to create some shouts! :D
Good idea. But I like this better - http://bigassmessage.com/
I don't quite get the point of this, but I do like the designs of the pages it generates
bigassmesage dont work 4 me. but choose MAGIC for seizures
@ptrsghr wow! that's also what I had in mind when i was making shout, though less nerdy. XD
@kaerast it's for shouting!!! :D seriously, it's when you want to share a message and make it look beautiful and center of attention, maybe a quote or a rant. :)
